=== Current Issues ===

I needed to compile ndiswrapper 1.33 to get the Broadcom wireless chips set to work.

<pre>
gpatterson@mbeast64:/var/lib/acpi-support$ ndiswrapper -l
bcmwl5 : driver installed
        device (14E4:4312) present (alternate driver: bcm43xx)
</pre>

==== Notes ====
I had trouble getting the kernel to boot due to what looks like a flaky apic implmentation, solution was to add ''noapic irqpoll noirqdebug'' to the boot parameters in grub.conf The parameter noirqdebug may not be required.
